title: Test
yAxis: Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 19 data points.
Overall Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2000 to 2006, roughly decreasing from 2006 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2014, and lastly slightly increasing from 2014 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars about 309.07 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars about 207.79 was recorded at Year 2000
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 19 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2018.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2000 to 2007.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
